name: omnipoly
description: OmniPoly is a self-hosted flashcard and spaced repetition tool with support for image and text content. It includes tagging, review scheduling, and a clean UI for personal study workflows.

features.title: Flashcard Creation
features.description: Build study cards with text and images on both sides for versatile learning materials

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Review cards on an optimized schedule that adapts to your performance for better retention

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize flashcards with multiple tags to create custom study sets and filter by topic

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Monitor review statistics and success rates to identify areas needing more practice

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Add diagrams, photos, or illustrations to cards for visual learning and memory association

features.title: Custom Decks
features.description: Organize flashcards into separate decks by subject, course, or learning goal for structured study

features.title: Review Scheduling
features.description: See upcoming reviews and daily study goals based on the spaced repetition algorithm

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep all study materials and progress on your own server for privacy and offline access
